metadata.title: CVE-2019-13274 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Xymon through 4.3.28, an XSS vulnerability exists in the csvinfo CGIscript due to insufficient filtering of the db parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xymon - 4.3.29-1
xymon-client - 4.3.29-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xymon package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.29-1').
